title: Healthier Hot Artichoke and Spinach Dip II

Ingredients.7: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.8: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped

Ingredients.9: 1 cup frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a small baking dish.

Directions.2: Mix together Neufchatel cheese, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, Romano cheese, garlic, basil, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Gently stir in artichoke hearts and spinach.

Directions.3: Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish. Top with mozzarella cheese. Bake in preheated oven until bubbly and lightly browned, about 25 minutes.
